Name: BloodHound Test
Author: SpecterOps - security@specterops.io
Description: The Bloodhound solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest audit logs related to Bloodhound application usage (e.g., user logins, data ingestions, query executions) and potentially critical attack path summaries directly into Microsoft Sentinel. This allows you to monitor the operational security of your Bloodhound deployments and integrate its key findings with other security insights in your environment. The connector uses Azure Functions to pull logs from Bloodhound's data sources.
WorkbookBladeDescription: This Microsoft Sentinel Solution installs workbooks. Workbooks provide a flexible canvas for data monitoring, analysis, and the creation of rich visual reports within the Azure portal. They allow you to tap into one or many data sources from Microsoft Sentinel and combine them into unified interactive experiences.
AnalyticalRuleBladeDescription: This solution installs the following analytic rule templates. After installing the solution, create and enable analytic rules in Manage solution view.
